Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 98 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Periods of rain beginning before morning. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming north 20 before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
